mapper.insert: insert into study_posts (title, description,category, userid) values ( #{title}, #{description}, #{category}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select p.studyid,p.title,p.description,p.category,p.userid,p.created_at, m.username FROM study_posts p JOIN member m ON p.userid = m.userid ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

select p.studyid,p.title,p.description,p.category,p.userid,p.created_at, m.username FROM study_posts p JOIN member m ON p.userid = m.userid where trim(p.category) = #{category} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
SELECT p.studyid, p.title, p.description, p.category, p.userid,p.created_at, m.username, m.bgColor FROM study_posts p JOIN member m ON p.userid = m.userid WHERE p.studyid = #{studyid}

#{id}
